title: The Springs at Sterling on the Lake, from +Jim Chapman Communities,  invites residents and visitors ...

attachments.displayName:
The Springs at Sterling on the Lake, from +Jim Chapman Communities,  invites residents and visitors to come experience the many colors of fall with splendid hot air balloons floating serenely above the Village Green. The fourth annual Harvest Balloon Festival is back on Saturday, Oct. 19, and this year’s event promises to be even bigger and better than the last.

http://www.atlantarealestateforum.com/soar-to-new-heights-at-the-harvest-balloon-festival-at-sterling-on-the-lake-82842/

object.content:
The Springs at Sterling on the Lake, from +Jim Chapman Communities,  invites residents and visitors to come experience the many colors of fall with splendid hot air balloons floating serenely above the Village Green. The fourth annual Harvest Balloon Festival is back on Saturday, Oct. 19, and this year’s event promises to be even bigger and better than the last.
